name: Tap Number Pro
description:
Tap Number is a new addictive and creative fun number game. It looks easy at first but will be challenging later. You can kill time with it or play with your friends and families.

How to play:
Click on the number to add 1 to it, and Tap Number - eliminate it with the same number around it and then plus 1. It’s so that simple and funny
Match at least 3 same numbers to merge
You can get bonus by merge more for larger numbers and for more points
3 kinds of props make games easily
There is no time limit, so keep playing


Top Features:
- Tap Number is very Easy to play & very fun
- Simple but exciting
- Simple graphic, high performance, and smooth effect
- Auto Save game processing, Involves more deep thinking and strategy instead of fast paced action.
- You can get bonus when you merge more numbers at once
- Try your best luck to play Fun Lucky Spin every day, collect free coins and prizes.
- Earn more coins each day and get more awesome rewards via play Tap Number!
